ComicInfo.Summary:
Drake, Becky, and a host of armed priests travel by rail as they escort the dead-but-dreaming corpse of General Hume to his final resting place. But this is the Old West, so you can be sure a train robbery is in the cards... and it's The Sixth Gun, so you can be sure this is a robbery like no other!
